description:
My place is close to the historic Flat Iron Building. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Brand new 1 bedroom apartment, 1.5 bathrooms, with a very spacious living room area in the beautiful Flat Iron area. Weekends preferred, but week long stays accepted.

The space has a very large living room and balcony. The balcony is accessible through the bedroom.

Guests have access to the entire apartment and all utilities. Please do not drink anything from the bar. Should you use the glassware/flutes, please be sure to hand wash them and return as these are extremely fragile. Only use the linen on the beds or in the ottoman, do NOT use linen in closets.

I am always accessible via phone, email or Airbnb.

My neighborhood is in the heart of flat iron. It is a lively neighborhood yet very safe. It is closing to almost all trains and easily to locate via cab.

Yes. The closest trains to us is the F/M which is located on 23rd street and 6th avenue or the N/R train located on 23rd street and 5th avenue. All other trains are on the same street and an avenue up.
name: Exposed Brick Spacious 1BR in Flat Iron
review: Grace's place is a nice large apartament in a great location in Manhattan.
